siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览Quora上的热门回答

blogPost.title: What is your advice to someone in college who is interested in starting a startup post graduation? Answer by Rexhi Dollaku, Partner at Base10 Partners. https://t.co/GzzCeB5tBj https://t.co/xoSVJJeSiW
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 卒業後にスタートアップを始めたいと考えている大学関係者へのアドバイスをお願いします。Base10 Partnersのパートナー、Rexhi Dollaku氏の回答です。https://t.co/GzzCeB5tBj https://t.co/xoSVJJeSiW
你对那些在大学里有兴趣在毕业后创办创业公司的人有什么建议？由Base10 Partners的合伙人Rexhi Dollaku回答。https://t.co/GzzCeB5tBj https://t.co/xoSVJJeSiW
你對那些在大學裏有興趣在畢業後創辦創業公司的人有什麼建議？由Base10 Partners的合夥人Rexhi Dollaku回答。https://t.co/GzzCeB5tBj https://t.co/xoSVJJeSiW

previous.title: What are the biggest lessons you’ve learned from starting a business? Answer by Gurinder Ahluwalia, Co-Founder & CEO of 280 CapMarkets. https://t.co/HoB1PsVmhY https://t.co/DOxabqqWAt

localize.full_text: 起業して得た最大の教訓は何ですか？280 CapMarketsの共同設立者兼CEOであるGurinder Ahluwalia氏による回答。https://t.co/HoB1PsVmhY https://t.co/DOxabqqWAt
你从创业中得到的最大教训是什么？280 CapMarkets的联合创始人& CEO Gurinder Ahluwalia的回答。https://t.co/HoB1PsVmhY https://t.co/DOxabqqWAt
你從創業中得到的最大教訓是什麼？280 CapMarkets的聯合創始人& CEO Gurinder Ahluwalia的回答。https://t.co/HoB1PsVmhY https://t.co/DOxabqqWAt

next.title: Is Disney trying to be more open about gender and sexual orientation? Answer by Nathalia Holt, Author of The Queens of Animation. https://t.co/CYmW1HXlvS https://t.co/PKyFrI7eG9

localize.full_text: ディズニーは、ジェンダーや性的指向についてもっとオープンにしようとしているのでしょうか？Answer by Nathalia Holt, Author of The Queens of Animation. https://t.co/CYmW1HXlvS https://t.co/PKyFrI7eG9
迪斯尼正试图对性别和性取向采取更开放的态度？回答者：Nathalia Holt，《动画皇后》作者。https://t.co/CYmW1HXlvS https://t.co/PKyFrI7eG9
迪斯尼正試圖對性別和性取向採取更開放的態度？回答者：Nathalia Holt，《動畫皇后》作者。https://t.co/CYmW1HXlvS https://t.co/PKyFrI7eG9
